title.rendered: Sharjah Airport International Free Zone (SAIF ZONE)

content.rendered:
Auditing

Registered Auditors in Sharjah Airport International Free Zone (SAIF ZONE)

Let us take care of all your audit requirements in the Sharjah Airport International Free Zone.

Book A Free Consultation

Home

Approved Auditors for Sharjah Airport International Free Zone

Sharjah airport free zone or SAIF zone is an ISO certified free zone with plenty of business opportunities and other facilities. The simplicity and swiftness of their work processes attract foreign investors to launch their business.

Registered auditors in Sharjah Airport International Free Zone organizes the financial structure of your company and it’s mandatory to submit the audit reports at the end of every financial year. The auditors ensure robust service to its SAIF zone clients, they give priorities to connection, convenience, and community.

Some of the benefits of choosing SAIF business setup,

  • Facilities tailored according to the individual company needs
  • Strategic location, well-connected highway of seaports, highways, and airports
  • Rapid clearance of logistics

Why audit is mandatory from Approved auditors in Sharjah Airport International Free Zone?

The companies operating in the SAIF zone should submit their audited book of accounts within 90 days from the end of financial year. These reports are submitted along with other audited financial statements.

If the company fails to submit the audit report from registered auditors in Sharjah Airport International Free Zone, it will lead to legal actions like non-renewal of the trade license.

At A&A Associate, we have a team of auditors who analyze on the reports and book of accounts prepared in compliance with the local and international rules. The report from auditor should be prepared in accordance with these rules and regulations. The auditors’ report states whether the accounts provide a true and fair view of the financial side of the company and make it absolutely free from material misstatements.

The companies operating in free zone are allowed to perform activities listed in the trade license and submit audit reports that comply with the SAIF zone.

How Approved auditors in Sharjah Airport International Free Zone support your auditing process?

Since, it’s mandatory for all the companies to have registered auditors in Sharjah Airport International Free Zone. These auditors maintain the book of records and ensure that the balance sheets are prepared in compliance with the IFRS or international financial reporting standards.

The book of records should have

  • Liabilities and assets of the company
  • Report of daily transactions
  • Receipt and expenditure report

As per SAIF regulations, the book of records must be kept at the registered office of the company. The first financial year can be decided by the companies in SAIF zone, according to their date of incorporation and certificate of incorporation.

What are the auditing services offered by A & A Associate?

We serve as one of the Approved auditors in Sharjah Airport International Free Zone creating high-quality audit report that comply with all the rules and regulations of the company. This improves the overall credibility of your company among the shareholders, lenders, government, and other authorities.

Being a registered auditor in Sharjah Airport International Free Zone, we implement the following steps,

  • Understand client’s business model and plan audit procedures according to it.
  • We visit client’s place for review and collect all the financial statements
  • We conduct auditing according to the accounting standards
  • We verify VAT compliance and ensure statutory auditing in SAIF zone
  • We issue the audit report and management letter
  • Local and international expertise in handling the auditing procedures

Why choose us?

A & A Associate is one of the Approved auditors in Sharjah Airport International Free Zone delivering high-quality book of accounts and present a fair opinion on the financial statement of the company. We have been serving a huge number of companies in SAIF zone to prepare their audit report and submit to the concerned authority.

A&A Associate have years of experience in supporting thousands of clients in complying with the free zone regulations. This allows them to achieve goals and enhance business growth. We ensure best auditing services in UAE according to the changing SAIF laws and regulations!
